welcome_message_body: Welcome to Xiamen, a charming coastal city known for its beautiful beaches, vibrant food scene, and rich history. We invite you to explore and enjoy all that Xiamen has to offer during your stay.

restaurants.name: Lucky Full City Restaurant (香港潮福城大酒楼)
restaurants.description: Lucky Full City Restaurant (香港潮福城大酒楼) is a cantonese restaurant located in 厦门市.
restaurants.address: 思明区湖滨北路, 厦门市, 福建省

restaurants.name: Coyote Café
restaurants.description: Coyote Café is a mexican restaurant located in 厦门市.
restaurants.address: 58-2 Yuan Dang road, 厦门市, 福建省

restaurants.name: Bellagio (鹿港小鎮)
restaurants.description: Bellagio (鹿港小鎮) is a taiwanese restaurant located in 厦门市.
restaurants.address: 16 Jianye Rd, 厦门市, 福建省

restaurants.name: C•B•D• Café
restaurants.description: C•B•D• Café is a breakfast spot located in 厦门市.

restaurants.name: Jacky Angela Steakhouse
restaurants.description: Jacky Angela Steakhouse is a steakhouse located in 厦门市.
restaurants.address: 2-0102 Donggang Lu (Dongdu Lu), 厦门市, 福建省
